```{r}

  # Read data
pr_data <- read_delim("Plasma_Retinol.txt", 
                      delim = "\t", 
                      escape_double = FALSE, 
                      col_names = FALSE,
                      trim_ws = TRUE)

colnames(pr_data) <- c("AGE",
                       "SEX",
                       "SMOKSTAT",
                       "QUETELET",
                       "VITUSE",
                       "CALORIES",
                       "FAT",
                       "FIBER",
                       "ALCOHOL",
                       "CHOLESTEROL",
                       "BETADIET",
                       "RETDIET",
                       "BETAPLASMA",
                       "RETPLASMA")


```


```{r}

  # multivariate regression
  # Some initial setup
  # m = 2
Y <- cbind("BETAPLASMA", "RETPLASMA")
  # n = 12
X <- setdiff(colnames(pr_data), Y)

form <- as.formula(
  paste0("cbind(", paste(Y, collapse=","), ") ~ ",
         paste(X, collapse="+")) )

model <- lm(form, data = pr_data)





```
